meanings.sent1: I am eagerly awaiting my birthday party.
meanings.sent2: The students are awaiting the results of their exam.
meanings.sent3: The cat is awaiting patiently for the mouse to come out of its hole.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden are awaiting the gentle touch of the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The children were eagerly awaiting the arrival of the ice cream truck.

meanings.definition: To be in store for; be imminent.
meanings.sent1: Dark clouds are awaiting a storm to unleash its fury.
meanings.sent2: The team is awaiting a tough match against their rivals.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy town is awaiting an unexpected visit from a famous celebrity.
meanings.sent4: The old house is awaiting its new owners to bring it back to life.
meanings.sent5: The quiet forest is awaiting the arrival of the first snowfall of winter.
